caption:
This photograph depicts three people enjoying a boat ride on a large expanse of water, which is presumably a lake or river. The boat is captured in motion, moving towards the right side of the frame, with water splashing around its hull, creating dynamic waves and spray.

The boat is a small, open motorboat with a pointed bow. It carries three passengers: a woman and a man sitting at the front, and another man standing towards the back, steering the boat. The woman, seated at the front, wears a dark shirt and is smiling, appearing to enjoy the ride. Next to her, the man wears a red life jacket and sunglasses, casually holding onto the sides of the boat as he looks forward.

The backdrop shows a cloudy sky with some blue peeping through, suggesting a day of mixed weather. In the distant background along the horizon, a thin line of trees or land indicates the far shore of the body of water. The overall atmosphere is lively, focusing on leisure and the enjoyment of a day out on the water.
title: EPA Gulf Breeze Laboratory: Field trip to nearby waters biologists will fish for contaminated and non-contaminated female shrimp. These will be compared in a study of the transmission of PCB to the young.
